languages.text: {n}Под взглядом Ксавьера Идира съеживается и, кажется, пытается отодвинуться вам за спину. Впрочем, Лорд-инквизитор не утруждает себя даже комментарием в адрес псайкера.{/n}
{n}Idira shrinks under Calcazar's gaze and seems to try to sidle behind you, but the Lord Inquisitor does not even deign to address the psyker with a remark.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Под взглядом Ксавьера Идира съеживается и, кажется, пытается отодвинуться вам за спину. Впрочем, Лорд-инквизитор не утруждает себя даже комментарием в адрес псайкера.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira shrinks under Calcazar's gaze and seems to try to sidle behind you, but the Lord Inquisitor does not even deign to address the psyker with a remark.{/n}

{n}Idira shrinks under Calcazar's gaze and seems to try to sidle behind you, but the Lord Inquisitor does not even deign to address the psyker with a remark.{/n}

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉在卡尔卡扎的注视之下瑟缩着，似乎想躲到你身后，但大审判官甚至都不愿意屈尊对这位灵能者开口。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shrinks under Calcazar's gaze and seems to try to sidle behind you, but the Lord Inquisitor does not even deign to address the psyker with a remark.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉在卡尔卡扎的注视之下瑟缩着，似乎想躲到你身后，但审判长甚至都不愿意屈尊对这位灵能者开口。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Idira se encoge bajo la mirada de Calcazar e intenta esconderse detrás de ti, pero el Lord Inquisidor no se digna ni siquiera a comentar la presencia de la psíquica.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shrinks under Calcazar's gaze and seems to try to sidle behind you, but the Lord Inquisitor does not even deign to address the psyker with a remark.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira se encoge bajo la mirada de Calcazar e intenta esconderse detrás de ti, pero el Lord Inquisidor no se digna ni siquiera a comentar la presencia de la psíquica.{/n}

languages.text: {n}イディラはカルカサルの視線を受けて萎縮し、あなたの後ろに隠れようとする。だが、ロード・インクィジターは異能者に何かをするつもりはないようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shrinks under Calcazar's gaze and seems to try to sidle behind you, but the Lord Inquisitor does not even deign to address the psyker with a remark.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラはカルカサルの視線を受けて萎縮し、あなたの後ろに隠れようとする。だが、ロード・インクィジターは異能者に何かをするつもりはないようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Idira se recroqueville sous le regard de Calcazar et essaie même de se cacher discrètement derrière vous, mais le seigneur inquisiteur ne fait aucune remarque concernant la psyker.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shrinks under Calcazar's gaze and seems to try to sidle behind you, but the Lord Inquisitor does not even deign to address the psyker with a remark.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira se recroqueville sous le regard de Calcazar et essaie même de se cacher discrètement derrière vous, mais le seigneur inquisiteur ne fait aucune remarque concernant la psyker.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Idira schrumpft unter Calcazars Blick zusammen und scheint zu versuchen, hinter dich zu rutschen, doch der Großinquisitor würdigt die Psionikerin keines Blickes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shrinks under Calcazar's gaze and seems to try to sidle behind you, but the Lord Inquisitor does not even deign to address the psyker with a remark.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira schrumpft unter Calcazars Blick zusammen und scheint zu versuchen, hinter dich zu rutschen, doch der Großinquisitor würdigt die Psionikerin keines Blickes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Calcazar'ın bakışları altında ezilen İdira, usul usul arkana saklanmaya çalışıyor. Lord Engizisyoncu ise ruhsezere hitap etmiyor bile.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira shrinks under Calcazar's gaze and seems to try to sidle behind you, but the Lord Inquisitor does not even deign to address the psyker with a remark.{/n}
